title: Trump Escalates Pressure on Venezuela, but Endgame Is Unclear
summary: President Trump’s aides have provided conflicting accounts of what, exactly, they are seeking to achieve, as America’s largest aircraft carrier heads toward the Caribbean region.

title: Former Fed Official Violated Trading Rules, Disclosures Show
summary: Adriana D. Kugler, who stepped down as a governor in August, reported trades in stocks, including Apple and Southwest Airlines, in 2024.

title: US Attorney Jay Clayton Under Pressure After Order to Investigate Democrats
summary: Jay Clayton, who heads the Southern District of New York, has so far managed to keep clear of President Trump’s most politically charged directives. Now, come the hard choices.

title: Trump Cuts Ties With Marjorie Taylor Greene, Calling Her ‘Wacky’
summary: The rupture comes ahead of a House vote on a measure that would compel the Justice Department to release the Epstein files.

title: Seven Days of Paralysis: Inside the BBC Crisis Over a Trump Documentary
summary: With board members and executives deadlocked over how to respond, the news organization kept silent for days, allowing a controversy to snowball.

title: Once He Was ‘Just Asking Questions.’ Now Tucker Carlson Is the Question.
summary: The conservative commentator has further fractured the right with his anti-Israel rhetoric and sympathy for a white nationalist. He’s not in the mood to apologize.

title: Maps Show How Latinos Who Shifted Right in 2024 Snapped Back Left in 2025
summary: The New Jersey governor’s race was the first significant sign that President Trump’s success with Hispanic voters in 2024 may have been only a temporary shift.

title: Russia Tried to Cut Ukraine’s Lights. Now It’s Aiming for the Heat.
summary: Moscow’s attacks on gas supplies, the main source of warmth for most Ukrainian households, could plunge millions into the cold.

title: Waymo Was Thriving in San Francisco. Then One of Its Driverless Cars Killed a Cat.
summary: The self-driving taxis have become ubiquitous in the city, but an uproar ensued when one ran over a beloved feline.

title: Is Your College Football Team Short of Cash? Sports Betting Can Help.
summary: Louisiana lawmakers tried a novel strategy for raising revenue, a model that proponents say might work more broadly.

title: The Outstanding Question About Epstein and Trump
summary: What unrevealed details have made Trump so intent on preventing further disclosure?

title: Trump Is Wrong About Fentanyl in Almost Every Way
summary: Everything the Trump administration is doing to stop the flow of drugs is just making the problem worse.

title: Tuning In
summary: Sometimes we assume the people and things around us are neutral or hostile to our existence. What if the opposite could be true?

title: Southern California Storm Forecast to Bring Heavy Rain and Flood Risk
summary: An unusually powerful storm prompted evacuation orders. Some locations in the mountains of Santa Barbara County have gotten more than eight inches of rain since Thursday.

title: Man Arrested After Appearing at Alina Habba’s Office With Bat, U.S. Says
summary: Authorities said Keith Michael Lisa had a bat when he showed up at the office of the U.S. attorney for New Jersey on Wednesday. He was charged with possession of a dangerous weapon in a federal facility.

title: Displaced Gazans Face More Misery as Torrential Rain Lashes Enclave
summary: Heavy rainfall and chilling winds have added to the challenges facing people still forced to live in tents in the devastated territory.

title: On a Clipped Wing, Flamingo Escapes a British Zoo for a Life in France
summary: Frankie, a young Caribbean Flamingo, flew 130 miles from captivity. Her keepers said they would likely have to leave her in France.
